* District 7


District 7
==========

District 7 – Ben Stewart
[View District 7 Map](https://georgetowntexas.gov/Documents/Government/City%20Council/District%207/CouncilDistrict7_Esize.pdf?t=202407081109070)

**Phone:**
512-930-3651
**Email:**
[ben.stewart@georgetowntexas.gov](mailto:ben.stewart@georgetowntexas.gov)
1st Term
**Term Expires:**
May 2028
![photo: Ben Stewart inside the Georgetown city council chambers](https://georgetowntexas.gov/Images/Government/City%20Council/District%207/Ben%20Stewart%202.jpg?t=202508061736440)

Technical Consultant. Ben has been working in technology for over 20 years, leading fortune 100 companies in strategy development and data analytics.

Bachelor of Science – Geographic Information Systems w/ Minor in Geology – Texas State University, 2006

* Former Board Member, Southeast Georgetown Community Council
* Former Member, Footprints Children’s Grief Ministry
* Former Member of the Planning and Zoning Commission
* Former Member of the City Charter Review Committee
* Former Member of the Georgetown Transportation Enhancement Corporation
* Member of the Georgetown Government and Finance Advisory Board

Ben is a third generation Native Texan and 10-year resident of District 7 in Georgetown.

With the approval of HB 1082 in May 2021, all elected officials' personal information is to be redacted from any public documents.
[View redacted campaign finance and expense reports through the City Secretary Records.](https://www.georgetowntexas.gov/government/secretarys_office/locate_city_records.php)
